New_Rochelle.Iona College (New York): Iona College is a Congregation of Christian Brothers-affiliated four-year college in New Rochelle, New York. Located 20 miles north of Midtown Manhattan in suburban Westchester County, the college occupies 45 acres (0.18 km2) at 715 North Avenue. It also operates a Graduate Center in Pearl River Rockland County, New York.
